column10: Inattentive drivers not paying attention to students crossing the road. Some drivers traveling too fast and/or stopping mid road unexpectedly. In the afternoon, all of this but additionally drivers blocking the road without reason (because itâ€™s inconvenient to park).
column21: One lane of travel each way with drivers parallel parking on the street simultaneously. Many drivers and many pedestrians looking at cell phones. Proximity to a long and busy traffic light. No crossing guard.
column34: LBSS parents FB group comment on thread discussing lack of student safety
